      • arraycopy

        public static void arraycopy(java.lang.Object src,
             int srcPosBytes,
             java.lang.Object dst,
             int dstPosBytes,
             int numBytes)
        Copy an array from src to dst. Types do not need to match (currently only BYTE -> ANY and ANY -> BYTE is supported) ByteOrder: Little-Endian
        Parameters:
        src - source array
        srcPosBytes - position in source array
        dst - destination array
        dstPosBytes - position in destination array
        numBytes - number of bytes to copy

        public static void fillZeroes(java.lang.Object arr,

              int numSamples)
        Fill array with zeroes
        Parameters:
        arr - source array
        posSamples - position in samples of first element to be of bytes to copy
        numSamples - number of zero samples to write

        Parameters:
